tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Srinivasa is very friendly, approachable and *** **** ********* ***** *** ** **** **** ****** ****** ****** **** ********** not always with  medicines, but he rather prefers home remedies which are actually effective. He is very caring while doing routine check up of small babies, observes them minutely and will try to give every single detail related to their health, overall growth and explains well with medical reasoning. He listens to you patiently and tries to clear all your doubts. He is never in hurry, gives you sufficient time and always ask if we have any further questions or doubts. We are highly satisfied with Dr Murthy for our 4 month daughter,  right from her birth till date for all her vaccination and routine check up and would recommend him to our friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Srinivas was phenomenal in treating my son with pre-term delivery. Post delivery Dr. Srinivas carried out the procedures for more than 2 hrs and ensured the baby is safe and all necessary action taken on time with detailed briefing.

His expertise on pre term babies is outstanding and within 7 days the baby was discharged from NICU and we are following up with the dr Srinivas for jaundice treatment.

I recommend dr. Srinivas murthy for pre term baby consultation and follow through.

Good job Dr. Appreciate all your efforts.

Thanks,
Preetham

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ******** ** ****** I brought my 2 kids to him for respiratory issues. When we entered the room, he rolled his eyes at me. He also prescribed 2 separate medications (1 for each of my children) ***** ***** **** ****** ** ******** ** **** **** ** ***** **** ***** ******* ***** I asked 3 times about medicines and he got upset. When leaving he got irritated because I was taking few minutes to gather kids and bag. he put his hand on my back, pushed me, and said go. * **** * ********* ** ***** ******** *** ******* ** ******* ** *** **** ** **** **** *** *** ******** **** ****

tags: None
review: Nature wise doctor is very good, very patient and answers each and everything u want to ask. Now coming to treatment part doctor starts the treatment even before getting the reports which came negative after 4 days of giving antibiotics by canula placed in baby hand. **** ****** *** *** ****** **** ******* **** *** ***** *** *** ***** **** ************** 4 days of pain to baby and parents  getting baby injected every 12 hours. Atleast if baby had fever then it would have made any sense. Not satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was very patient when listening to us, he listens to understand and not to answer. His was of putting across things is brilliant, he uses medial terms and then explains us in lay man terms so that we understand everything clearly. His treatment plan and follow up was great, he shares his personal contact (which is very rear) to reach in case of emergency. Most important of all, his words and actions make you trust him and his treatment without any doubt. Our baby was in safe hands, thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Our twin babies were born prematurely and kept in NICU  for 28 days. Our babies discharged and came home in good health.

Dr. Srinivasa treated our babies with step by step treatments like addressing respiratory problems, feed tolerance, treat the jaundice....

Best part of his is he listens to you patiently and carefully and answers you with good explanation, so that you will understand the problem as well as steps to be taken to address the problem.

He updates the progress of the baby during his rounds to NICU by explaining all the details like how much weight baby gain / lose, what are the symptoms they have observed yesterday and how they will handle that. 

He always ends the conversation by asking the patient's "Do you have any question", by this patient will get chance to recall and ask if they have anything. 

Overall I am satisfied with his treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Visited for Twins- New Born.
Twin Boys were born end of 34 th week on 01.01.18.
Both had to be kept at NICU due to prematurity( 34+6weeks).
Twin-1 & Twin-2 were at NICU for 9 days & 18 days respectively due to Respiratory Distress; Sepsis; Viral Infection; Jaundice & other minor issues.
We were updated on daily basis on the status, progress made on daily basis during this tenure at Hospital. We are very happy on the new born kids recovery, the treatment that the kids received at NICU during the stay  & returning back to home in good health. The interaction with the Doctor was very cordial during this stay.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******** ** *** ** *** **** **** ****** *** *********** ***** *** ********* ** *********** ******** **** ******* ** ************ The best part about visits to him is that he would not recommend any unnecessary treatment and would mostly try avoiding medication unless it's completely necessary. If in case there is a condition, he explains it in detail to the parents before starting the treatment which helps us understand why we are doing something for the baby. Also, he's always available on call during emergency and responds back to messages quickly which avoids unnecessary visits to the hospital. 
In my personal opinion, as parents we love to give the best care to our babies and with a paed who understands the baby's health so well, we wouldn't be compromising on healthcare :)

tags: None
review:
My twin girls were born prematurely and were kept in NICU for 10 days . 
Dr Srinivasa tool good care of the babies while they were in NICU and worked towards their speedy recovery . He kept us updated regularly about the progress as well.
Babies are discharged now and are healthy .

we are still consulting same Doctor fir regular checkups and for vaccinations . 

He is very soft spoken and answers all our queries . He handles the babies with love and care. 
He is also available over phone whenever needed even at odd hours and provides immediate help.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor Srinivas is very friendly takes enough time with his patience. We been consulting him for our new born baby. He always explains us about the treatment and the medicine given to the baby. He is available anytime and responds to the call and messages.

Easy appointments on any required day without much waiting time. Overall good experience. Thank u doctor for your care and advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Srinivasa takes time to listen to the details of the ailment. He is very proficient in dealing with new born babies and arrives at appropriate diagnosis. Doesn't prescribe unnecessary medications. When the baby is sick at a tender age of 5 days after birth, meeting with a doctor such as him helped calm us down and get the right treatment for our daughter. I would surely recommend Dr. Srinivasa to all other parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: ** ** **** ************** He listens to us patiently and explain the issue by thoroughly testing the baby. He was the pediatrician attended during my second baby's delivery. Overall we are very happy with the service we received during the delivery and regular consultations post delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very helpful. He took time and explained each and every one of our questions and being first time parents, we had a million of those. He made as feel very comfortable and made certain we left relaxed and took time to explain all the little things that we could worry about. I would definitely refer him to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The level of care given to the children appeared insufficient. Instead of providing a clear explanation of the issue, there was a strong push for admission and inquiries about health insurance. **** ********** ****** ** ** **** ******** **** ****** *** ***** *** ******* ******* *** ** **** ********* *** *** ******* **** ********************** ** *** ********** **** *** ********** ***** **** ********* *** ** **** **** ****** ********** *********.

I will not recommend this hospital or the doctor for pediatric care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am glad to know Dr. Srinivasa C. L and would like to share my case. I was beyond impressed with my experience at motherhood hospital. My first contact was in Canada 2016 and I was completely blown away by how helpful ***  *** ************* he was. I was happy that he is available in India now, so I was able take his consulation for my newborn baby. He has been our primary care paediatrician and has always provided the absolute best care. He has always been calm and reassuring which is very much required. He takes enough time with his patience and provides needed care at time. We appreciate him and his staff very much.

Thank you so much for being so gentle all the time.

tags: None
review: A big thanks to Dr Srinivas . I'm blessed with baby boy, but delivery happened in 34th week also baby was under weight when born,so he was kept in NICU for 17 days. Dr Srinivas was one who treated my baby. From day one he started explaining about how baby is doing . He is very friendly and understand the problems and suggest the solution. He give more time to child . He don't compromise with the treatment whatever may be the situation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor patiently explained everything and gave the best treatment possible and my baby recovered quickly. Very helpful and goes out of the way to help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This doctor gives more importance to your insurance and is interested in its numbers more than the illness. If he gets to know that you have an insurance facility, He is the best to utilise the entire limit and make sure you are completely out of the insurance limit and please don't ask me about the kind of treatment he provided. please think at least twice or thrice before reaching him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Srinivas was speaking to nurse for 5mins while we were sitting next to him. he gave us another 5 mins. not shared any details about baby's weight and health condition, directly prescribed medication. ***** ******** ** *** ** *** **** * *******. the lady who was injecting vaccines was very rude ** **** ***  *** *** ************ the way she injected and removed the syringe made baby cry so much which we never faced earlier. *** *** ******** ** *** ******* *** *** ******* ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr listens to all your queries and provides a solution for each,  when you visit. Will also share his Whatsapp contact number through which we can contact him any time and ask him questions regarding baby's well being. Will also explain the medicines and the reason for prescribing them.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ** * **** ****** *** explained us well about newborn jaundice. With the good experience we had been showing our infant till 8months. On the 8th mo general checkup he pinched my babies nipples mentioning us ‘not to do it.’ He explained that few massage as such so that breast will not grow .. but I felt as if my child was abused and The cry of my baby made me move out to another **** ** **** pediatric.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Highly NOT recommendable. 
We spent almost a full day at the hospital with our 3-month-old son with a high fever and he just tried to convince us to admit him to NICU. We spent almost 8 thousand rs and returned back to home without any medication or treatment. Had to consult another doctor which understood the reason for the fever and was prescribed proper medication and our son recovered within a day. 
Financially, mentally, emotionally exhausting experiance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** * **** *******
Was in so hurry. Did not listen to us neither give any medicines nor check our ongoing medicines.didnt even tell us diet for 6-7 month baby
Completely unstatisfied. After waiting for an hour doc just gave us 3-4 min time and rushed out
***** ******** *** ******Waste of money and time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I met first doctor in my life who said don't call me in night even in emergency. My daughter had cough and vomit problem . he gave 2 bottle of glucose and 3 blood test *** ** ****** ** **** ******* ******** ** ***** *** **** * we spent 2 days in hospital and my baby need to carry niddle for 2 days .
reply_text: Sorry for your inconvenience. We will be working atleast for 12 hrs during the day. We specifically instruct not to call in night because we have emergency hospital numbers and 24/7 on call duty Pediatrician who will be taking calls for emergency.  During emergencies, it’s difficult for us to give treatment in phone. You have to come to hospital for a visit, so that some sort of emergency treatment is given.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a very critical situation for my wife's Anti Natal related delivery problems..  but by God's grace and the helpful hands of very good doctors everything went good.. both mother n child are safe now.. Thanks to Motherhood, HRBR Banasavadi, Bangalore..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr.  Srinivas has been a great source of information, has been of great help since I had doubts on baby's feed and vaccinations as a new mommy,  doctor took his time to respond to my queries with no much delay, which is really appreciable. Will definitely recommend  this doctor to people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My baby was born premature (5 weeks early) . Dr. Srinivasa Murthy has been a great doctor in treating my baby throughout his prematurity .  My baby has been in nicu for 3 days and he played a major role by closely monitoring the baby and helping him reach a stable state. The same care that he had for the baby while he was in nicu was continued even post nicu. I recommend him for any complex premature baby’ treatment as well  for any baby’ health issues
